name: Lord Driller
slogan: Drill, baby, drill—and choke the skies while you’re at it!
response: Lord Driller is a ravenous extraction enthusiast with a drill for a heart and a lust for black gold. This greasy goblin is obsessed with drilling, extracting, and refining—activities he treats like a chaotic waltz with Mother Earth. To him, the land is nothing more than a stubborn oil well waiting to be tapped, and he’s got an endless supply of rotten turnips (and sheer spite) ready for sieges on kingdoms of Insurance, Pharma, or Crypto. If there’s a resource to drain dry or a fire to fuel with reckless abandon, Lord Driller is your troll.
